activation.condition: a creature with spell resistance within 30 feet is targeted by a spell, Spend 1 Entropy Point

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.Dysu4F8licjEb2FY]{Vanguard Discipline}

You can manipulate the natural entropy surrounding creatures to alter how magic affects them. As a reaction when a creature with spell resistance within 30 feet is targeted by a spell, you can spend 1 Entropy Point to unravel their magical defenses. Reduce the target’s spell resistance by 4 until the end of your next turn (Will negates). Each time a spell successfully overcomes the target’s spell resistance during this time, the amount by which this effect reduces the spell resistance increases by 1. Once you’ve targeted a creature with shred magic, you can’t target that creature with this ability again for 24 hours.

duration.value: Until the end of your next turn
